caption: In this episode, a detective receives a peculiar phone call, leading to the discovery of a man dead in a hotel room who had been engaging in online dating with a woman, who is unaware of his demise. The detective and his partner unravel a larger conspiracy behind the case. Highlights: the detective and his partner discover the dead man who was online dating; the woman is oblivious to the man's death; suspicions arise about a larger conspiracy; the man had posed as a ghost to date women in chat rooms; the investigation into the chatroom uncovers a disturbing secret. Their investigation encounters police obstruction; the case implicates a notable police officer, forcing them to leave the scene; the dead man had dated a woman who subsequently died; when visiting the woman's family, her mother is found to be dating a man. This man, a con artist, also posed as a ghost to date women. Ultimately, the case is solved, and the detective reminds his partner that his life will undergo significant changes after marriage.
